title: Dan Greenawalt - Forza 7 at E3
description: This week our good friends over at Turn 10 are back in LA for E3 to show off Forza Motorsport 7.  As is tradition creative director at Turn 10 Dan Greenawalt joins us to talk about the new game. In addition to the new game we touch on the brand new Xbox One X and gaming in HDR + 4k along with Dan's love for his GT350.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
